doc.title: America's Iliad: The Siege of Charleston
doc.plot: Mike Kirk has produced a powerful documentary about one of the most pivotal and heroic military campaigns in history - the battle for Charleston, South Carolina during the American Civil War and the swath of destruction and social upheaval it created for its citizens. Kirk looked to the ancient Greek poet, Homer for insight into the minds of warriors. The film presents military leaders, civilian diarists, free African Americans, and slaves.
